sentences.en: Comment: The company name and electric plug symbolize its area of expertise.
sentences.cn: 评价: 公司名称与电插头形象,说明公司的工作领域.

sentences.en: Crime often symbolizes a wider social problem.
sentences.cn: 犯罪问题往往反映出更广泛的社会问题。

sentences.en: Decision trees have standard symbols: squares symbolize decision points, and circles represent chance events.
sentences.cn: 决策权有统一的符号: 用方框表示决策点, 用圆圈表示可能的事件.

sentences.en: Did it not symbolize the eternal , unvarying triumph of Good over Evil?
sentences.cn: 这是不是象征善永远战胜恶?

sentences.en: Display at the room, to have a better symbolize a rich!
sentences.cn: 摆放于室内, 有满堂富贵之美好寓意!

sentences.en: Easter eggs symbolize the renewal of life.
Growing discontent has been symbolized by the protests.
sentences.cn: 与日俱增的不满通过一次又一次的抗议表现出来。

sentences.en: He would symbolize the importance we attached to the assignment.
sentences.cn: 他将体现我们对这个职务所寄予的重要性.

sentences.en: I love these colours because they symbolize mellowness, abundance , strength and happiness.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢这秋色,因为它表示着成熟 、 昌盛和繁荣,也意味着愉快、欢乐和富强.

sentences.en: Sage has been known to symbolize strength for thousands of years.
sentences.cn: 鼠尾草千百年来被当作强有力的象征.

sentences.en: The fall of the Berlin Wall symbolized the end of the Cold War between East and West.
sentences.cn: 柏林墙的倒塌象征着东西方冷战的结束。

sentences.en: The give each other a gold ring to symbolize their marriage commitment.
sentences.cn: 但有时一些夫妇宣读他们自己的誓言.

sentences.en: The handicrafts gourd of pyrographic, Symbolize good luck, will bring riches for you.
sentences.cn: 烫花的手工艺葫芦, 象征吉祥,会为你带来好运气.

sentences.en: The new clothes symbolize a fresh start for the year ahead.
sentences.cn: 新衣象徵一元复始、万象更新.

sentences.en: They give each other a gold ring to symbolize their marriage commitment.
sentences.cn: 但有时两人也可以编一套自己的誓言.

sentences.en: This book publication will symbolize the genuine humanism birth!
sentences.cn: 本书的出版将标志着真正人类主义的诞生!

sentences.en: To represent with or as if with an emblem; symbolize.
sentences.cn: 象征用或好象用象征物来表示; 标志.

sentences.en: What does this strange mark symbolize?
sentences.cn: 这个奇怪的符号象征什么？

words.tran_cn: 象征的；符号的；使用符号的
象征，象征主义；符号论；记号
象征主义者；符号学者；记号使用者
象征；符号表现；象征作用
符号学，符号使用；象征学，象征的使用
用符号表示，使用符号（等于symbolize）

trans.tran_en: if something symbolizes a quality, feeling etc, it represents it

trans.tran_cn: 使用符号，采用象征，作为…的象征
